io.oasp.module.security.common.impl.accesscontrol

Class AccessControlSchemaTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.assertj.core.api.Assertions
      • io.oasp.module.test.common.base.ModuleTest
        • io.oasp.module.security.common.impl.accesscontrol.AccessControlSchemaTest

  • public class AccessControlSchemaTest
extends ModuleTest
    This is the test-case for AccessControlSchema and AccessControlSchemaXmlMapper.
